About Me

BIO

Hi, my name is Aaron Cole. I am a student at Northview Public Schools, with a passion for web and application development. I would make a great addition to your team because of my willingness to learn new skills, collaborate with others, and take on rewarding challenges.

Developer

Front-End

I use clean HTML5 to create the content. That content's presentation is then enhanced through elegant CSS3 and tools such as Sass, Grid, or Bootstrap. Any necessary logic and DOM manipulation is then done through Javascript and its frameworks such as AngularJs.

Developer

Back-End

In order to retrieve and store data a Back end is needed for that complex application. The database choices I work with are MySql and MongoDB. To comunicate and fetch data from APIs, the following are used, NodeJs, Express, and AJAX.

Designer

Responsive

It is the responsibility of the UI/UX developer to create an intuitively designed web application. When I think UI, I think clean, elegant, responsive, and above all else user-friendly.
